segments.text: I'm just standing here, watching everything unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing from the faucet, completely filling the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's now pouring over the edge in a steady stream onto the cabinets below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice this growing puddle at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in it, and she's just polishing that plate so calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are up to their own brand of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is precariously balanced on that stool, it looks so wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the cookie jar; with the other hand he holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl is right there, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a recipe for disaster, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the splash of the falling stool already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
